entry.title: $2200 // Wyckoff Avs.♦ Beautiful ♦1 bed, ♦2 bath
entry.content:
1 Bed / 2 Bath at 322 Grove St - Unit: 3F in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Small Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs, Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs. Beautiful 1 bed, 2 bath right off Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains. Amenities include rooftop access, central A/C, stainless steel appliances, a gas stove, hardwood floors, high ceilings and a private balcony. Close to the best of the neighborhood, including restaurants, bars and grocery stores.

Contact Me directly at 34 seven 5 69 five 503 to schedule an appointment

AMENITIES
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Natural Light in Living Area
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Stone countertops
Balcony
Outdoor Space
Roof access
Central A/C
